text: qal almalak mjybana zakariaa emma tejjab mnh: hkdha al'amr kama taqul min kawn amra'atak eaqrana, wblwghk min alkibar etyana, wlknn rabik qal: khalq yahyaa ealaa hadhih alkyfyt 'amr sahl hyin elya, thuma dhikr allah subhanah lzkrya ma hu 'aejab mimaa sa'al eanh fqal: waqad khalaqtuk 'ant min qibal yhya, walam tk shyyana mdhkwrana wala mwjwdana
